headline: AEROTECH LINEAR STAGE, 5MM TRAVEL
description: Linear Stage    Aerotech AVS 105   New, never used
specstable:
Manufacturer Aerotech
Model AVS 105
Configuration Single Axis
Total Travel, XYZ X: 0.20 in (5 mm)
Mechanical Drive System Lead screw
Maximum Payload 22.00 lb (9.98 kg)
Maximum Travel Speed 0.197 in/s (5 mm/s)
Motor Drive: Stepper Motor
Other Information

Threaded holes on top of stage are 6mm metric
(2) stages have Aerotech motors Model 55SM B2-HM
(2) stages have Applied Motion motors P/N 5023-243
